title: How to Bake Cinnamon Flop Coffee Cake

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Whisk together sugar, flour and baking powder.
Beat the egg with the milk and salt.
Combine the flour and egg mixtures.
Pour batter into an 8-inch round, 2-inch deep, baking dish.
Sprinkle with the cinnamon sugar and drizzle the melted butter over the top.
Bake for 1/2 hour or until done.
Let cake cool a few minutes on a wire cooling rack.

text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).  Whisk together sugar, flour and baking powder.  Beat the egg with the milk and salt.  Combine the flour and egg mixtures.  Pour batter into an 8-inch round, 2-inch deep, baking dish.  Sprinkle with the cinnamon sugar and drizzle the melted butter over the top.  Bake for 1/2 hour or until done.  Let cake cool a few minutes on a wire cooling rack. Cut and serve. Finished.
